bigger_coops.Name: Bigger Coops
bigger_coops.Description: Your dinosaurs are living in crowded, dirty conditions. Buy a bigger coop so you can make more dinosaurs live in crowded and dirty conditions!

bigger_storage.Name: Bigger Egg Warehouse
bigger_storage.Description: Don't put all your eggs in one basket. At Eggcelent Storage Solutions, we make sure each one of your eggs has its own luxury silk-lined basket.

sell_100.Name: Eggs In The Trunk
sell_100.Description: Your current strategy of carrying eggs and running with them to the market is proving ineffecient.
